Minneapolis.William Henry Eustis:
William Henry Eustis (1845 – November 30, 1928) was the 17th mayor of Minneapolis, Republican nominee for Governor of Minnesota in 1898, and a philanthropist.


== Biography ==
Eustis was born in Jefferson County, New York on July 17, 1847. When he was 15 years old, he contracted a hip disease, which required him to walk with a cane and then with crutches.
